Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The app bundle signature was validated for core content of the app bundle published by %1. App packages won't be validated until they are read.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="subjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The streaming reader was created successfully for app package %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The reader was created successfully for app package %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because it's a framework package.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because the bundle also contains the package with file name "%4" and package full name "%5" which applies to the same processor architecture. Bundles can't contain multiple app packages for the same processor architecture, or an architecture-neutral app package with any architecture-specific app package.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="currentFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="currentPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="conflictingFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="conflictingPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because the bundle also contains the package with file name "%4" and package full name "%5" which has the same resource ID. Bundles can't contain multiple resource packages with the same resource ID.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="currentFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="currentPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="conflictingFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="conflictingPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because it uses a different hash algorithm than other packages in the bundle. The expected hash algorithm is %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="expectedValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because it has a different package family name than other packages in the bundle. The expected package name is %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="expectedValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because it has a different package family name than other packages in the bundle. The expected publisher is %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="expectedValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The bundle must contain at least one app package.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The bundle can't contain more than 10000 packages.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: App manifest validation error: Line %2, Column %3, Reason: The Extension element with the Category attribute value "%4" must not specify the "%5" attribute.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="lineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="columnNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="extensionCategoryName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="attributeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Creating IAppxPackageWriter, force Zip32 format = %1, hash method = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="zipMode" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="hashMethod" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: IAppxPackageWriter closed
Adding payload file, file name = %1, content type = %2, compression = %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="contentType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="compressionOption" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Payload file added
Adding footprint files and closing IAppxPackageWriter
IAppxPackageWriter closed
Creating IAppxPackageReader
IAppxPackageReader created
Caching and validating block hash of payload file, file name = %1, size = %2, compression = %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="size" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="compressionOption" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Payload file cached and validated
Creating IAppxPackageStreamingReader, options = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="readerOptions" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: IAppxPackageStreamingReader created
Executing %1 range requests in IAppxRequestHandler, priority = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="requestCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="priority" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Range requests completed
Creating app manifest reader
App manifest reader created
Creating blockmap reader
Blockmap reader created
Decompressing block, compressed size = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Block decompressed, uncompressed size = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Downloading package metadata
Package metadata downloaded
Checking SIP support for file
Check for SIP support completed
Returning signature or signature size from app package
Signature or signature size returned from app package
Adding signature to app package
Signature added to app package
Removing signature from app package
Signature removed from app package
Creating or sizing indirect data
Indirect data created or sized
Verifying indirect data
Indirect data verified
Looking up friendly names for capability with SID %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="capabilitySid" inType="win:SID" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Looking up friendly names for capability with SID %1 finished with result %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="capabilitySid" inType="win:SID" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="result" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Verifying the file stream against the block map file hash
Block map file hash verified against the file stream
Creating IAppxBundleWriter
IAppxBundleWriter closed
Adding payload package
Payload package added
Adding footprint files and closing IAppxBundleWriter
Footprint files added and IAppxBundleWriter closed
Checking AppxBundle SIP support for file
Check for AppxBundle SIP support completed
Returning signature or signature size from app bundle
Signature or signature size returned from app bundle
Adding signature to app bundle
Signature added to app bundle
Removing signature from app bundle
Signature removed from app bundle
Creating or sizing bundle indirect data
Bundle indirect data created or sized
Verifying bundle indirect data
Bundle indirect data verified
Creating IAppxBundleReader
IAppxBundleReader created
Creating bundle manifest reader
Bundle manifest reader created
The bundle reader was created successfully for bundle %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The bundle streaming reader was created successfully for bundle %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because the bundle contains another package with the same file name.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because its package type doesn't match the value found in the bundle manifest.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because its identity doesn't match the value found in the bundle manifest. The expected package full name is %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="expectedValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because its resources don't match the values found in the bundle manifest.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because its manifest declares a value for %4 which isn't supported in bundles. The minimum supported value is %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="currentFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="currentPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="attributeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="expectedValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: The package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" is not valid in the bundle because its manifest doesn't declare any Application elements.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="packageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: error %1: All app package manifests in a bundle must declare the same values under the XPath %10. The values under this XPath declared in the manifest for the package with file name "%2" and package full name "%3" at line %4, column %5 don't match those declared in the manifest for the package with file name "%6" and package full name "%7" at line %8, column %9.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="errorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="currentFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="currentPackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="currentManifestLineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="currentManifestColumnNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="referenceFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="referencePackageFullName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="referenceManifestLineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="referenceManifestColumnNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="xPathToMismatchLocation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
